title: Air Pollution Records in Reno, NV

communications.subject: Nevada Public Records Act Request: Air Pollution Records in Reno, NV
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Nevada Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

I am requesting public records related to air pollution in Reno, Nevada. Specifically, I am interested in obtaining any available data or reports related to air quality monitoring in the city of Reno over the past five years (2018-2020). I am interested in any violations of federal or state air quality standards in the Reno area, including enforcement actions taken by the Environmental Protection Agency or the Nevada Department of Environmental Protection.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Victor Ledezma

communications.subject: Nevada Public Records Act Request: Art Project Grants
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Nevada Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

I am requesting all project grants and agreements which fund organizations to do arts programming in Reno from January 2018-2023

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Victor Ledezma

title: Contracts with Nevada and Barrick Gold Corp.

communications.subject: Nevada Public Records Act Request: Contracts with Nevada and Barrick Gold Corp.
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Nevada Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

I am requesting all agreements and contracts with the state of Nevada and the mining company, Barrick Gold Corporations,  from January 2020-2023

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Victor Ledezma
